report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-27231 WordPress WP Statistics plugin Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-27231 WordPress WP Statistics plugin Vulnerability
text: WP Statistics plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victims Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victims cookie-based authentication credentials

report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-27231 WordPress WP Statistics plugin Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-27231 WordPress WP Statistics plugin Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-27231 WordPress WP Statistics plugin Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-27231 WordPress WP Statistics plugin Vulnerability
text: WordPress WP Statistics plugin for WordPress 8.4 WordPress WP Statistics plugin for WordPress 9.1.2 WordPress WP Statistics Plugin for WordPress 12.0.1 WordPress WP Statistics Plugin for WordPress 12.0.4

report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-27231 WordPress WP Statistics plugin Vulnerability
text: Upgrade to the latest version of WP Statistics plugin for WordPress, available from the WordPress Plugin Directory.
